mapper.sql: id, surgeryNo, timestamp, cumulativeTime, bloodPump, separationPump, dialysisPump, tripePump, filtrationPump, circulatingPump, heparinPump, warmer, bloodPumpT, separationPumpT, dialysisPumpT, tripePumpT, filtrationPumpT, circulatingPumpT, heparinPumpT
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PumpSpeedData( surgeryNo, timestamp, cumulativeTime, bloodPump, separationPump, dialysisPump, tripePump, filtrationPump, circulatingPump, heparinPump, warmer, bloodPumpT, separationPumpT, dialysisPumpT, tripePumpT, filtrationPumpT, circulatingPumpT, heparinPumpT ) VALUE (#{surgeryNo} , #{timestamp}, #{cumulativeTime}, #{bloodPump}, #{separationPump}, #{dialysisPump}, #{tripePump}, #{filtrationPump}, #{circulatingPump}, #{heparinPump}, #{warmer}, #{bloodPumpT}, #{separationPumpT}, #{dialysisPumpT}, #{tripePumpT}, #{filtrationPumpT}, #{circulatingPumpT}, #{heparinPumpT})

INSERT INTO PumpSpeedData( surgeryNo, timestamp, cumulativeTime, bloodPump, separationPump, dialysisPump, tripePump, filtrationPump, circulatingPump, heparinPump, warmer, bloodPumpT, separationPumpT, dialysisPumpT, tripePumpT, filtrationPumpT, circulatingPumpT, heparinPumpT ) VALUES
(#{surgeryNo} , #{timestamp}, #{cumulativeTime}, #{bloodPump}, #{separationPump}, #{dialysisPump}, #{tripePump}, #{filtrationPump}, #{circulatingPump}, #{heparinPump}, #{warmer}, #{bloodPumpT}, #{separationPumpT}, #{dialysisPumpT}, #{tripePumpT}, #{filtrationPumpT}, #{circulatingPumpT}, #{heparinPumpT})
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM PumpSpeedData WHERE surgeryNo = #{surgeryNo} ORDER BY timestamp

SELECT
FROM PumpSpeedData WHERE surgeryNo = #{surgeryNo} AND timestamp > #{beginTime} AND timestamp < #{endTime} ORDER BY timestamp
